column4: hi, any idea how do i find out the RGB values of pixels in a png picture (in ubuntu) :) ?
it's somewhat possible with the netpbm tools, for instance, though there's probably better ways (the GIMP to start with, if GUI is ok)
use the color picker and then click on the main color box to see the values - i think
dystopianray, thanks "color picker" were the magic words i needed :)
